title: Caleb Amisi, other 8 leaders call out Samia Suluhu over Karua’s detention: "Consider an apology"
excerpt: Kenyan leaders have condemned Tanzania’s detention and deportation of Martha Karua, citing violations of EAC protocols on free movement and democratic principles.

title: Rigathi Gachagua urges opposition to endorse him to face Ruto in 2027: "I'm best candidate"
excerpt: Former deputy president Rigathi Gachagua declared that he was in a good position to defeat President William Ruto in the upcoming 2027 General Election.

title: Tundu Lissu case: Martha Karua detained in Tanzania, to be deported back to Nairobi
excerpt: Kenyan lawyer Martha Karua and two others have been detained at Dar es Salaam airport and are awaiting deportation ahead of opposition leader Tundu Lissu's case.

title: Gachagua's supporters invade Oscar Sudi's Facebook page after attacking ex-DP
excerpt: Kapseret MP Oscar Sudi has responded to remarks made by former Deputy President Rigathi Gachagua during an interview on the night of Friday, May 16.

title: Rigathi Gachagua reveals DCP party received KSh 100m in donation from supporters
excerpt: Former deputy president Rigathi Gachagua has revealed that his newly launched party, DCP, received KSh 100 million from its supporters just days after launch.

title: Gachagua says he's not sure Ruto is believer despite going to church: "Mimi nilikuwa nafunga macho"
excerpt: Former deputy president Rigathi Gachagua questioned President William Ruto’s faith, saying no true Christian would sanction the crackdown on Gen Z protesters in 2024

title: Moses Kuria explodes on Rigathi Gachagua after belittling Chama Cha Kazi: :I'm your senior"
excerpt: Former Gatundu South MP Moses Kuria has harshly rebuked former deputy president Rigathi Gachagua for allegedly belittling his Chama Cha Kazi (CCK).

title: Farouk Kibet blasts Rigathi Gachagua for forming DCP party, alleges it's aimed at dividing Kenyans
excerpt: President William Ruto's aide Farouk Kibet cautioned Kenyans against paying attention to former deputy president Rigathi Gachagua with his shenanigans.

title: Raila Odinga's luo critic loses state job in latest govt appointments
excerpt: William Ruto revokes appointments of a key critic of Raila Odinga in three state agencies, replacing them with new leaders set to serve three-year terms.
